docs.text:
Clever Credit gives you better control of overdue balances and approaching
credit limits. It puts chosen documents (for example Sales Orders) on hold if a
customer has overdue balances or a Sales Order would put them over their Credit
Limit. You can give them defined User Specific Monetary Authorisation limits to
enable Sales Orders to be released as required and/or define a specific grace
period for overdue balances. Users can be set as Credit Controllers and be
assigned to specific accounts. This Addition also has new features designed to
assist Credit Controllers in the chasing of debts and ensuring timely payment,
as well as helping with the recording of promised payment dates and ensuring
they are followed up on. These To-Do’s can be created manually or automatically
and are automatically closed if the payment comes in.

docs.title: Managing Credit Held Document(s)

docs.text:
Deployment:
 Built entirely in NAV, no third-party software to install or
license.


Grouping Records:
 Allows the user to highlight multiple records and choose
whether to: Release multiple documents from the Credit Held List, update
multiple Ledger Entries at once, or pay multiple Invoices early if required.


Configuration:
 Credit Management allows Document Types to be configured by
any field in the Credit Control table, such as by Credit Controller or Payment
Terms Code.


Customization:
 Can decide on global Credit Management settings based on
Document Type.


Personalization:
 Can override global settings created in Credit Management
Setup and personalise them to individual customers in their Customer Card e.g.
for a customer who you would never want to put on Credit Hold, regardless of
Document Type. Within User Setup, it is also possible to personalise the Credit
Management functionality on a user by user basis within the NAV system, such as
by setting different Credit Held Release Limits for different users if required.


Custom Table Layout:
 This Addition allows filtering by Balance (LCY) if
needed, making it easier to understand data. On the Credit Control page, you are
also able to filter by the Ageing of Accounts and differentiate the ageing of
debts by 30, 60, 90, 120, and 120+ days.


Interaction Method:
 You can link the Credit Management Addition to an
automated phone dialler system (TAPI) with customers, as well as interact via
email to chase up payments.


Placeholders:
 Document Fields can be created in Credit Management, such as
new Credit Management Status Codes. These can then be applied when updating
Ledger Entries.


Compatibility with Existing Bespoke:
 Logic can be configured to use existing
bespoke functionality such as the Cash Receipt Journal.


NAV Versions:
 Supports NAV 2017 and later
